identity.address: Av. du Général Sangoulé Lamizana, Koulouba, Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso

partnership.description: Bank of Africa Burkina Faso is a banking player with a network of more than 60 branches covering the entire territory and a strong orientation towards digital banking. The partnership covers today:
points: High-speed and secure connectivity (Dedicated Internet, MPLS interconnection of branches, BIO access).
Banking mobility (Enterprise voice, Fleet mobile, SMS Banking for notifications and OTP).
Support for digital innovation, particularly on interoperability projects with Orange Money and the implementation of mobile banking services.

complaints.title: Billing reminder on links
complaints.description: BOA operating by fiscal year, it is difficult for the client to justify this reminder in order to pay off its debt. The client believes that the responsibility lies with Orange (given the delay relating to this reminder) and wants a solution proposal that would suit both parties.
complaints.resolution: A meeting was held with the client and all corrected invoices concerning the reminder were sent.

scraping_llm.partnership_summary: Bank of Africa Burkina Faso has been a strategic partner of Orange since 2021, benefiting from a complete telecom infrastructure to support its 60+ branches. The partnership covers connectivity, mobility and digital innovation, with a particular focus on Orange Money interoperability.

sector_context: Increased international surveillance (FATF grey list): This constraint pushes banks like BOA to strengthen the security and transparency of their information systems.
Need for technological partnerships: Creates needs with reliable telecom players for network supervision, fraud management and compliance.
company_news: Net banking product: Up 2.3% (14.2 billion FCFA).
Net profit: Down 16.6% (5.2 billion FCFA), due to a tense economic environment.

identity.address: Avenue de l'Indépendance, Sector 15, Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso

partnership.description: Coris Bank International is a major financial institution in Burkina Faso with strong regional presence. Partnership includes:

scraping_llm.partnership_summary: Strategic partnership since 2019 focusing on digital transformation and financial inclusion in Burkina Faso.

sector_context: Digital banking expansion in rural areas

company_news: New branch openings in rural areas

points: MPLS network for inter-branch connectivity.
Business mobility solutions for corporate clients.
Unified communications platform.
24/7 network monitoring and support.

complaints.title: Connectivity issues in rural branches
complaints.description: Intermittent connectivity issues affecting branches in rural areas, impacting customer service quality.
complaints.resolution: Signal boosters installed and backup connectivity established.

scraping_llm.partnership_summary: Recent partnership since 2022 with focus on expanding UBA's digital footprint in Burkina Faso.

company_news: Branch expansion: 3 new branches planned for 2024
Digital services: Mobile app upgrade completed

identity.address: Boulevard de la République, Plateau, Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire

partnership.description: Banque Atlantique Côte d'Ivoire is a historic Orange partner with a strong national presence. The partnership includes:
points: MPLS connectivity for all branches (35 sites).
Mobility solutions for field teams.
24/7 network security and monitoring services.
Digital banking platform integration.

complaints.title: Network latency issues
complaints.description: High latency observed on inter-branch connections affecting real-time transactions and customer service quality.
complaints.resolution: Network optimization completed and additional bandwidth allocated to critical sites.

scraping_llm.partnership_summary: Banque Atlantique Côte d'Ivoire has been collaborating with Orange since 2019 to modernize its banking infrastructure across the country. The partnership focuses on digital transformation and customer experience enhancement.

sector_context: Digital transformation acceleration: Leading the digital banking revolution in West Africa.
Financial inclusion: Expanding services to rural areas through mobile banking solutions.
company_news: Innovation: Launch of AI-powered customer service chatbot.
Expansion: Opening 10 new branches in rural areas.

identity.address: Avenue Charles de Gaulle, Centre-ville, Douala, Cameroon

partnership.description: Commercial Bank of Cameroon is developing an ambitious digital transformation strategy with Orange. The partnership includes:
points: Network infrastructure for 50 branches and business centers.
Mobility solutions for sales forces and field agents.
Unified communication platform for headquarters.
Digital payment solutions integration.

complaints.title: Service interruptions during peak hours
complaints.description: Frequent service interruptions during peak business hours affecting customer transactions and internal operations.
complaints.resolution: Infrastructure upgrade completed and redundancy systems implemented.

scraping_llm.partnership_summary: Commercial Bank of Cameroon focuses on technological innovation with Orange since 2020. The partnership aims to modernize banking infrastructure and improve customer experience through advanced telecom solutions across Central Africa.

sector_context: Central Africa banking leader: CBC positions itself as the leading digital bank in the CEMAC region.
Cross-border expansion: Projects to expand services to neighboring CEMAC countries.
Regulatory compliance: Adapting to new BEAC digital banking regulations.
cybersecurity_focus: Comprehensive cybersecurity training for all staff
company_news: Innovation: Launch of blockchain-based cross-border payment system.
Partnerships: Strategic alliance with Orange Money for mobile payments.
Growth: 22% increase in digital transactions in 2024.
